data.name: UPDATE 2/19/20 Google Docs Sepia Dark Theme V2.3.0
data.description:
A fix for the recent update on google docs that broke every single other dark theme here. Makes everything on google docs black and sepia.

To remove the sepia paper, edit the CSS by scrolling all the way down and changing the "BEGIN Sepia Background" section's #F3EAD9 hex code to whatever color/hex you want. White hex is #ffffff

Feel free to message me if this ever breaks again.

data.name: Flight Rising: Highlight Boss Familiars
data.description: Highlights boss familiars with a rainbow outline for easy identification
data.css:
@-moz-document domain("flightrising.com") {
img[src$='/familiar/23842.png'],

    #grad { 
        background-image: linear-gradient(-170deg, IndianRed,LightSalmon,LemonChiffon,LightGreen,CornflowerBlue,MediumPurple,violet);
        border-radius: 5px !important;
      }
}

data.name: Warez-BB Dark Theme Part One (Repaired)
data.description:
I am not the creator of this script; I have just repaired it. For it to work, you must go to the settings page of Warez-BB and select "WBB2" at Board Style.

This is part one. For all images to be correctly changed, please also apply part two.

https://userstyles.org/styles/111539/warez-bb-dark-theme-part-two-repaired

Warez-BB thread

https://www.warez-bb.org/viewtopic.php?p=86241270#86241270

Updated: now the logo works.

data.name: No Ads + Playlist Fix — Yandex.Music
data.description: No Ads Удалена реклама везде, где нашёл. Playlist Fix Вариативный выбор размера всплывающего окошка по количеству плейлистов. tags: music.yandex.ru, music.ya.ru, я.музыка, яндекс.музыка, ads, реклама
